thread.section_title: Experthelp.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Experthelp.com | www.experthelp.com
thread.title: RICHARD UNRATH

author: RICHARD UNRATH
title: RICHARD UNRATH
text: I was disappointed that the help received was done at a $ cost to me. I needed an owner's manual to operate a new TV and since none was received with the purchase of the TV, I Emailed Samsung to obtain price and availability of one. What I received was a response from Experthelp to provide a do-it-yourself website for printing a manual myself at my own expense plus a cost for providing the web address. The additional cost did not please me in the least!
